name: Wiz Max 2 - for C64 game
description:
Wiz Max - C64

The return of the evil witches who have once again taken control of the wizard's castle "Wiz Voxya Max". The witches "Blackya Witch" and  "Purple Witch", have cast a new spell using their creatures against the "poor wizard ball" by stealing the "magic crystals" from his precious magical collection again. Fortunately Wiz V. Max, the magician's ball is within reach with his powerful wand; he will have to venture through the castle and retrieve the crystals, which the evil witches have placed in various rooms of the castle. However, you will not be alone ... Fight monsters, recover crystals and face various evil witches and defeat their leader "Purple Witch" Good luck WizMax !!!
Get as many points as possible and enter the ranking of the famous!

-Credits 

-Vox Videogame &Co.  game year 2020 ;

-Made with vertical S.e.u.c.k "Outlaw Sensible Software 1987"

-Game Design & Animation, Fx sound effects by Pinov Vox ; -Additional programming and ingame enhancements in Kickassembler by Richard   Bayliss  TND64  "The New Dimension 64"   tnd64.unikat.sk ; -Title  /  ingame music by Vg Vox ; -Front end gfx by Pinov Vox ; -Pic Loader (Picture) by "PARR" (Enrico Umagon Tirelli) .
